attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Take action to get back the money invested into the United States debt via US treasury bonds etc.

In July 2009 the USA owed the UK $220 billion. The debt level the USA owes the UK has increased from $66 Billion to $220 Billion from July 2008 to July 2009.
During this period the unemployment figures rose to 3 Million in the UK.
The UK government should take whatever action is required to get this money back and use the money to invest into the UK economy to save jobs and cut our own debt levels.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
